Trips: heartLoop 1s infinite 1s normal forwards; } svg.animate.mod-saved { animation: heartPulse 0.3s both 0.6s ease-in-out; } svg.animate.mod-saved .heartWave { animation: heartSavedState 0.5s normal ease-in-out forwards; } @keyframes heartUnsavedState { from { -webkit-transform: scale(1.55); -moz-transform: scale(1.55); -ms-transform: scale(1.55); transform: scale(1.55); } 33% { -webkit-transform: scale(1.55); -moz-transform: scale(1.55); -ms-transform: scale(1.55); transform: scale(1.55); } to { -webkit-transform: scale(0); -moz-transform: scale(0); -ms-transform: scale(0); transform: scale(0); } } @keyframes heartSavedState { to { -webkit-transform: scale(1.55); -moz-transform: scale(1.55); -ms-transform: scale(1.55); transform: scale(1.55); } } @keyframes heartSavingState { from { -webkit-transform: scale(0); -moz-transform: scale(0); -ms-transform: scale(0); transform: scale(0); } to { -webkit-transform: scale(1); -moz-transform: scale(1); -ms-transform: scale(1); transform: scale(1); } } @keyframes heartPulse { 50% { -webkit-transform: scale(1.2); -moz-transform: scale(1.2); -ms-transform: scale(1.2); transform: scale(1.2); } } @keyframes heartBounce { 25% { -webkit-transform: rotate(10deg); -moz-transform: rotate(10deg); -ms-transform: rotate(10deg); transform: rotate(10deg); } 50% { -webkit-transform: rotate(-10deg); -moz-transform: rotate(-10deg); -ms-transform: rotate(-10deg); transform: rotate(-10deg); } 75% { -webkit-transform: rotate(5deg); -moz-transform: rotate(5deg); -ms-transform: rotate(5deg); transform: rotate(5deg); } 100% { -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg); -moz-transform: rotate(0deg); -ms-transform: rotate(0deg); transform: rotate(0deg); } } @keyframes heartLoop { from { -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg); -moz-transform: rotate(0deg); -ms-transform: rotate(0deg); transform: rotate(0deg); } to { -webkit-transform: rotate(45deg); -moz-transform: rotate(45deg); -ms-transform: rotate(45deg); transform: rotate(45deg); } }
